produit.description: Samsung Galaxy Fold Android smartphone. Announced Feb 2019. Features 7.3 Dynamic AMOLED display, Snapdragon 855 chipset, 4380 mAh battery, 512 GB storage, 12 GB RAM.
Samsung Galaxy S10 5G Android smartphone. Announced Feb 2019. Features 6.7 Dynamic AMOLED display, Exynos 9820 Octa chipset, 4500 mAh battery, 256 GB storage, 8 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass 6.
Samsung Galaxy S10+ Android smartphone. Announced Feb 2019. Features 6.4 Dynamic AMOLED display, Exynos 9820 Octa chipset, 4100 mAh battery, 1024 GB storage, 12 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass 6.
Samsung Galaxy S10 Android smartphone. Announced Feb 2019. Features 6.1 Dynamic AMOLED display, Exynos 9820 Octa chipset, 3400 mAh battery, 512 GB storage, 8 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass 6.
Samsung Galaxy S10e Android smartphone. Announced Feb 2019. Features 5.8 Dynamic AMOLED display, Exynos 9820 Octa chipset, 3100 mAh battery, 256 GB storage, 8 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass 5.
Samsung Galaxy Watch Active watch. Announced Feb 2019. Features 1.1 AMOLED display, Exynos 9110 chipset, 230 mAh battery, 4 GB storage, 768 MB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass 3.
Samsung Galaxy M30 Android smartphone. Announced Feb 2019. Features 6.4 Super AMOLED display, Exynos 7904 Octa chipset, 5000 mAh battery, 128 GB storage, 6 GB RAM.
Samsung Galaxy A50 Android smartphone. Announced Feb 2019. Features 6.4 Super AMOLED display, Exynos 9610 Octa chipset, 4000 mAh battery, 128 GB storage, 6 GB RAM.
Samsung Galaxy A30 Android smartphone. Announced Feb 2019. Features 6.4 Super AMOLED display, Exynos 7904 Octa chipset, 4000 mAh battery, 64 GB storage, 4 GB RAM.
Samsung Galaxy A10 Android smartphone. Announced Feb 2019. Features 6.2 IPS LCD display, Exynos 7884 Octa chipset, 3400 mAh battery, 32 GB storage, 2 GB RAM.
Samsung Galaxy Tab S5e Android tablet. Announced Feb 2019. Features 10.5 Super AMOLED display, Snapdragon 670 chipset, 7040 mAh battery, 128 GB storage, 6 GB RAM.
Samsung Galaxy Tab A 10.1 (2019) Android tablet. Announced Feb 2019. Features 10.1 IPS LCD display, Exynos 7904 Octa chipset, 6150 mAh battery, 32 GB storage, 2 GB RAM.
Samsung Galaxy M20 Android smartphone. Announced Jan 2019. Features 6.3 PLS TFT display, Exynos 7904 Octa chipset, 5000 mAh battery, 64 GB storage, 4 GB RAM.
Samsung Galaxy M10 Android smartphone. Announced Jan 2019. Features 6.22 PLS TFT display, Exynos 7870 Octa chipset, 3400 mAh battery, 32 GB storage, 3 GB RAM.
Samsung Galaxy A8s Android smartphone. Announced Dec 2018. Features 6.4 IPS LCD display, Snapdragon 710 chipset, 3400 mAh battery, 128 GB storage, 8 GB RAM.
Samsung Galaxy A6s Android smartphone. Announced Oct 2018. Features 6.0 Super AMOLED display, Snapdragon 660 chipset, 3300 mAh battery, 128 GB storage, 6 GB RAM.
Samsung Galaxy A9 (2018) Android smartphone. Announced Oct 2018. Features 6.3 Super AMOLED display, Snapdragon 660 chipset, 3800 mAh battery, 128 GB storage, 8 GB RAM.

Samsung Galaxy A7 (2018) Android smartphone. Announced Sep 2018. Features 6.0 Super AMOLED display, Exynos 7885 Octa chipset, 3300 mAh battery, 128 GB storage, 6 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass (unspecified version).
Samsung Galaxy Note9 Android smartphone. Announced Aug 2018. Features 6.4 Super AMOLED display, Exynos 9810 Octa chipset, 4000 mAh battery, 512 GB storage, 8 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass 5.
Samsung Galaxy Watch watch. Announced Aug 2018. Features 1.3 Super AMOLED display, Exynos 9110 chipset, 472 mAh battery, 4 GB storage, 1.5 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass DX+.
Samsung Galaxy J6+ Android smartphone. Announced Sep 2018. Features 6.0 IPS LCD display, Snapdragon 425 chipset, 3300 mAh battery, 64 GB storage, 4 GB RAM.
Samsung Galaxy J4 Core Android smartphone. Announced Nov 2018. Features 6.0 IPS LCD display, Snapdragon 425 chipset, 3300 mAh battery, 16 GB storage, 1000 MB RAM.
Samsung Galaxy J4+ Android smartphone. Announced Sep 2018. Features 6.0 IPS LCD display, Snapdragon 425 chipset, 3300 mAh battery, 32 GB storage, 3 GB RAM.

Samsung Galaxy J2 Core Android smartphone. Announced Aug 2018. Features 5.0 PLS TFT display, Exynos 7570 Quad chipset, 2600 mAh battery, 8 GB storage, 1000 MB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass (unspecified version).

Samsung Galaxy Tab S4 10.5 Android tablet. Announced Aug 2018. Features 10.5 Super AMOLED display, Snapdragon 835 chipset, 13 MP primary camera, 8 MP front camera, 7300 mAh battery, 256 GB storage, 6 GB RAM.
Samsung Galaxy Tab A 10.5 Android tablet. Announced Aug 2018. Features 10.5 IPS LCD display, Snapdragon 450 chipset, 8 MP primary camera, 5 MP front camera, 7300 mAh battery, 32 GB storage, 3 GB RAM.

Samsung Galaxy On6 Android smartphone. Announced Jul 2018. Features 5.6 Super AMOLED display, Exynos 7870 Octa chipset, 13 MP primary camera, 8 MP front camera, 3000 mAh battery, 64 GB storage, 4 GB RAM.
Samsung Galaxy J7 (2018) Android smartphone. Announced Jun 2018. Features 5.5 TFT display, 3300 mAh battery, 32 GB storage, 2 GB RAM.

Samsung Galaxy J3 (2018) Android smartphone. Announced Jun 2018. Features 5.0 IPS LCD display, Exynos 7570 Quad chipset, 8 MP primary camera, 5 MP front camera, 2600 mAh battery, 16 GB storage, 2 GB RAM.

Samsung Galaxy A8 Star (A9 Star) Android smartphone. Announced Jun 2018. Features 6.3 Super AMOLED display, Snapdragon 660 chipset, Dual: 24 MP (f/1.7) + 16 MP primary camera, 24 MP front camera, 3700 mAh battery, 64 GB storage, 6 GB RAM.

Samsung Galaxy S Light Luxury Android smartphone. Announced May 2018. Features 5.8 Super AMOLED display, Snapdragon 660 chipset, 16 MP primary camera, 8 MP front camera, 3000 mAh battery, 64 GB storage, 4 GB RAM.

Samsung Galaxy J8 Android smartphone. Announced May 2018. Features 6.0 Super AMOLED display, Snapdragon 450 chipset, Dual: 16 MP (f/1.7, AF) + 5 MP primary camera, 16 MP front camera, 3500 mAh battery, 64 GB storage, 4 GB RAM.

Samsung Galaxy J6 Android smartphone. Announced May 2018. Features 5.6 Super AMOLED display, Exynos 7870 Octa chipset, 13 MP primary camera, 8 MP front camera, 3000 mAh battery, 64 GB storage, 4 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass (unspecified version).

Samsung Galaxy J4 Android smartphone. Announced May 2018. Features 5.5 Super AMOLED display, Exynos 7570 Quad chipset, 13 MP primary camera, 5 MP front camera, 3000 mAh battery, 16 GB storage, 2 GB RAM.
Google Pixel 3 XL Android smartphone. Announced Oct 2018. Features 6.3 P-OLED display, Snapdragon 845 chipset, 3430 mAh battery, 128 GB storage, 4 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass 5.
Google Pixel 3 Android smartphone. Announced Oct 2018. Features 5.5 P-OLED display, Snapdragon 845 chipset, 2915 mAh battery, 128 GB storage, 4 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass 5.

Google Pixel XL Android smartphone. Announced Oct 2016. Features 5.5 AMOLED display, Snapdragon 821 chipset, 12.3 MP primary camera, 8 MP front camera, 3450 mAh battery, 128 GB storage, 4 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass 4.

Google Pixel 2 XL Android smartphone. Announced Oct 2017. Features 6.0 P-OLED display, Snapdragon 835 chipset, 12.2 MP primary camera, 8 MP front camera, 3520 mAh battery, 128 GB storage, 4 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass 5.

Google Pixel 2 Android smartphone. Announced Oct 2017. Features 5.0 AMOLED display, Snapdragon 835 chipset, 12.2 MP primary camera, 8 MP front camera, 2700 mAh battery, 128 GB storage, 4 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass 5.

Google Pixel Android smartphone. Announced Oct 2016. Features 5.0 AMOLED display, Snapdragon 821 chipset, 12.3 MP primary camera, 8 MP front camera, 2770 mAh battery, 128 GB storage, 4 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass 4.
Google Pixel C Android tablet. Announced Oct 2015. Features 10.2 LTPS IPS LCD display, Nvidia Tegra X1 chipset, 8 MP primary camera, 2 MP front camera, 9240 mAh battery, 64 GB storage, 3 GB RAM.
